title: Chicken Fricassee
author: Chef Todd Leoanrd CEC
steps: Dredge each piece of chiken in the flour mixed with the Pit Seasoning.
Sear the dreged chicken in a braising pan Rondoux.
Pull the chicken out after browned and add the butter, onions and garlic, saute until light brown and translucent.
Add 1-2 tablespoon of the dredging flour to the pot and stir in to make a roux.
Add the white wine and let cook for a minute, add the stock and bring to a simmer.
Add the chicken back to the sauce and cook for a bout 1/2 hour, sauce should thicken nicely, if too muck just add a little stock.
Take the chicken out of the pan and add the cream to the sauce and stir well, adjust seasoning and consistency.
Strain sauce through a strainer and place chicken back in sauce.
Add herbs if desired, serve with rice or portatoes!
